acf.heading: Get fluconazole online.
acf.first_paragraph: Fluconazole is often prescribed to prevent and treat a variety of fungal and yeast infections. It works by stopping the growth of certain types of fungus.

accordion.accordion_title: What is fluconazole and how does it work?
accordion.accordion_intro: Fluconazole belongs to the class of drugs called azole antifungals. It works by killing the fungus or yeast, or preventing its growth.
accordion.accordion_content: If you think you need fluconazole, you can speak to a doctor on Maple to see if it is right for you.

accordion.accordion_title: What are the uses for fluconazole?
accordion.accordion_intro: Fluconazole is a form of medication used to prevent and treat fungus or yeast. The most common type of fungal or yeast infection is caused by an overgrowth of Candida albicans which disrupts the normal balance of bacteria and yeast in the affected areas.
accordion.accordion_content: Fluconazole can be helpful for different forms of fungus or yeast. You can speak to a doctor on Maple to see your specific symptoms can be treated with it.

accordion.accordion_intro: Take fluconazole by mouth with or without food as directed by your doctor, usually once daily. Dosage is based on your medical condition and response to treatment. For children, the dosage is also based on weight. Generally, in children, the dose should not exceed 600 milligrams daily unless directed by the doctor.
accordion.accordion_content: This medication works best when the amount of medicine in your body is kept at a constant level. Therefore, take it at the same time each day as directed.

accordion.accordion_title: What are the side effects and risks of fluconazole?
accordion.accordion_intro:
You should always speak with a doctor to make sure that fluconazole is right for you. Possible side effects include:

  • Nausea
  • Vomiting
  • Diarrhea
  • Headache
  • Dizziness
accordion.accordion_content: Tell your doctor right away if you have any serious side effects, including: loss of appetite, unusual tiredness, weight loss, fast/irregular heartbeat, severe dizziness, fainting.

accordion.accordion_intro: Before using this medication, tell your doctor or pharmacist about your medical history, especially if you have had: abnormal ECGs, liver disease and/or kidney disease.
accordion.accordion_content: Fluconazole passes into breast milk during nursing so consult your doctor if you are breast-feeding. During pregnancy, this product should only be used as needed.
